sections.heading: Publication
sections.text:
of legal notice or advertisement only in qualified newspaper of general

circulation and on Internet website of qualified newspaper; exceptions.

sections.heading: Newspapers
sections.text: and Internet website of newspapers equally competent as means for publication.

sections.heading: Publication
sections.text:
of legal notice or advertisement once each week for full period in qualified

newspaper; exceptions for notice or advertisement published on Internet website

of qualified newspaper.

sections.heading: Rates
sections.text:
and size of type for official advertising of State and counties; annual

contracts for county printing and advertising.

sections.heading: Authorized
sections.text: use of registered or certified mail in giving required notice.

sections.heading: Date
sections.text: of postmark deemed date of filing or payment.
